results.overview: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas and set thirty years after Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983).
results.original_title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
results.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens

results.overview: In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.
results.title: The Revenant

results.overview: Through a series of misunderstandings, Alvin, Simon and Theodore come to believe that Dave is going to propose to his new girlfriend in New York City - and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal.
results.original_title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
results.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip

results.overview: The men who made millions from a global economic meltdown.
results.title: The Big Short

results.overview: Pasanga 2:Haiku is a 2015 Indian Tamil children's film directed by Pandiraj. The film, starring three children—Kavin, Nayana and Abhiman, all newcomers—alongside Karthik Kumar, Bindu Madhavi, Ramdoss and Vidya Pradeep, is produced by Suriya, who also appears in a cameo role along with Amala Paul.The film will mark Pandiraj's last of the 'trilogy for children', following Pasanga and Marina. The film was dubbed into telugu as Memu.
results.title: Pasanga 2

results.overview: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.
results.title: Beyond Skyline

results.overview: A successful film composer falls in love when he travels to India to work on a Bollywood retelling of Romeo and Juliet.
results.title: Un plus une

results.overview: A zombie outbreak plagues a small English town on Christmas Eve.
results.original_title: Silent Night of the Living Dead
results.title: Silent Night of the Living Dead

results.overview: Two disconnected sisters are summoned to clean out their childhood bedrooms before their parents sell their family home.
results.title: Sisters

results.overview: During a routine hospital visit with female prisoner Jules Hope, Prison Officer David Murdoch’s life quickly spirals out of control after receiving a phone call which suddenly puts him on the opposite side of the law. With his pregnant daughter Emma’s life being threatened, Murdoch finds himself forced to go on the run, thus becoming the prey.
results.title: Prey II

results.overview: When his long-lost outlaw father returns, Tommy "White Knife" Stockburn goes on an adventure-filled journey across the Old West with his five brothers.
results.title: The Ridiculous 6

results.overview: A story based on the life of a struggling Long Island single mom who became one of the country's most successful entrepreneurs.
results.title: Joy

results.overview: "Dolly Parton's Coat of Many Colors" is based on the inspiring true story of living legend Dolly Parton's remarkable upbringing. This once-in-a-lifetime movie special takes place inside the tight-knit Parton family as they struggle to overcome devastating tragedy and discover the healing power of love, faith and a raggedy patchwork coat that helped make Parton who she is today.
results.title: Coat Of Many Colors

results.overview: Natural Selection is a story of triumph and absolution. It explores both sides of human nature, where love as well as hate are separated by a thread and the potential corrosion of ones soul by the influence of evil.
results.title: Natural Selection
Belle and Sebastian: The Adventure Continues

results.overview: Melvin (Stephen Dorff), a reluctant hero who is far from super, has been suppressing his telekinetic powers for years with booze, drugs, and women. In the process, he has failed at practically everything, most of all as a parent to his son. After a brush with death, Melvin decides to use his powers for good and clean up the streets of New Orleans with the help of his best friend/definitely-not-a-sidekick, Lucille (Eddie Griffin). For a man who can do the impossible, it might be a fight even he can’t win.
results.title: American Hero

results.overview: A Madison Avenue executive, Amy, discovers an unusual Christmas surprise when she inherits her Aunt’s hometown bakery. The real surprise comes when she learns the other half of the bakery was left to her long-ago boyfriend, Jack. Unresolved personal issues resurface between them, as the exes return home to co-manage the store, along with its traditional holiday cookie bake-off.
results.title: A Christmas Reunion

results.overview: Clairvoyant femme fatale Nicola Six has been living with a dark premonition of her impending death by murder. She begins a tangled love affair with three uniquely different men: one of whom she knows will be her murderer.
results.title: London Fields

results.overview: UFC 194 from the MGM Grand Gardens Arena headlined by the long awaited fight between Jose Aldo and Conor McGregor for the Unified Featherweight Title.
results.title: UFC 194: Aldo vs. McGregor
